articles.author: DEREK GATOPOULOS and NICHOLAS PAPHITIS Associated Press give
articles.title: Greek coast guard defends actions as more than 500 migrants heading for Europe feared dead in wreck - ABC News
articles.description: The Greek coast guard on Friday defended its response to the sinking of a ship that went down off the country’s south coast and left as many as 500 migrants presumed drowned
articles.content: ATHENS, Greece -- The Greek coast guard on Friday defended its response to a ship that went down off the country's south coast and left more than 500 migrants presumed drowned. Criticism mounted over… [+6459 chars]
